name: 張國楨
objective:
本課程將系統性地闡述活動構造之基本特徵、引致之自然災害、相對應之調查方法其工程評估的原理、方法，並以藉由相關的案例來整合說明。主要包含五方面:
1. 活動構造的地質、地形特徵及判識。
2. 活動構造可能產生的各種災害。
3. 活動構造各種調查方法。
4. 活動構造各工程處理對策。
5. 工程案例分析及待解決的問題。
schedule:
(1) Fault and Faulting
(2) force and stress
(3) deformation and strain
(4) rheology
(5) brittle and ductile deformation
(6) faulting mechanism
(7) behavoir of active structure
(8) mechanics of earthquakes
(9) seismic cycle
(10) seismotectonics
(11) Tectonic geomorphology
(12) harzaed of active structure
(13) Investigation of active structure
(14) evalution of and countermeasure against active faluts
(15) case hisories of engineering evalution for active faults
scorePolicy: 期中考、期末考、野外地質考察報告
materials:
(1) The mechanics of Earthquakes and faulting, by C. Scholz, Cambridge  University press, 2002
(2) Surface processes and Landforms, by D. Easterbrook, Prentice Hall, 1999
(3) Tectonic Geomorphology, by D. Burbank and R. Anderson, Blackwell Science, 2001
